worm lizard, amphisbaenian

sense.gloss: don't judge a book by its cover
evading blame for a transgression by pinning it on a subordinate and abandoning them, a skink lizard's shedding of its tail

sdata.j: あの↑声↑↓こえ↓で↑蜥蜴↑↓とかげ↓↑食↑↓く↓らうか↑時鳥↑↓ほととぎす↓。
sdata.e: Don't judge a book by its cover.
